QuestData.Title: Tortolla's Triumph
QuestData.Description: I'll escort the children of Tortolla out of here and seal up this accursed portal.$B$BI'll leave it to you to inform Tortolla of our victory. Simply step back through the flamegate. The ancient will be pleased!
QuestData.LogDescription: Step back through the flamegate and return to Tortolla at the Scorched Plain in Hyjal.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Step back through the flamegate and return to Tortolla at the Scorched Plain in Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: You've been to the firelands?$B$BNemesis is dead?$B$BSo it is finished.$B$BThank you.
